tool_description:
DayWatch's API provides powerful data access to real-time daily deal and coupons data in USA, Latin America and South East Asia.

Search deals per country, location, category and activity.

About DayWatch: DayWatch is the ultimate real-time business reporting and decision support tool for Daily Deal companies. Industry reports, analytics, insights, metrics, market penetration, market shares, business performance: every moment, at anytime. All integrated into a web portal.

http://www.usedaywatch.com

A Product Powered by tryolabs.com
name: DayWatch
title: DayWatch

api_list.name: Companies

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Response format. Supported: JSON, XML, YAML

api_list.name: USA Deals
api_list.description: Currently active daily deals in the United States of America

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Response format. Supported: JSON, XML, YAML

optional_parameters.name: offer__icontains
optional_parameters.description: Filters offers that contain the given string in the offer title.

optional_parameters.name: description__icontains
optional_parameters.description: Filters offers that contain the given string in the offer description.

optional_parameters.name: merchant_name__icontains
optional_parameters.description: Filters offers published by the given merchant.

optional_parameters.name: city__icontains
optional_parameters.description: Filters offers available in a given city.

optional_parameters.name: discount__range
optional_parameters.description: Filters offers whose discount value is in the given range. You may also replace the __range modifier by any of the following: __gt, __gte, __lt, __lte in order to filter values greater than, greater or equal, lower than, lower or equal, respectively.

optional_parameters.name: price__range
optional_parameters.description: Filters offers whose price value in national currency is in the given range. You may also replace the __range modifier by any of the following: __gt, __gte, __lt, __lte in order to filter values greater than, greater or equal, lower than, lower or equal, respectively.

optional_parameters.name: price_usd__range
optional_parameters.description: Filters offers whose price value in US dollars is in the given range. You may also replace the __range modifier by any of the following: __gt, __gte, __lt, __lte in order to filter values greater than, greater or equal, lower than, lower or equal, respectively.

optional_parameters.name: sold_count__range
optional_parameters.description: Filters offers whose sold count is in the given range. You may also replace the __range modifier by any of the following: __gt, __gte, __lt, __lte in order to filter values greater than, greater or equal, lower than, lower or equal, respectively.

api_list.name: API Summary
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tryolabs-daywatch.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tryolabs-daywatch.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tryolabs-daywatch.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tryolabs-daywatch.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
